code: export var GET_OFFER='GET_OFFER';export var GET_OFFER_SUCCESS='GET_OFFER_SUCCESS';export var GET_OFFER_FAIL='GET_OFFER_FAIL';export var GET_OFFER_RESET='GET_OFFER_RESET';export var getOffer=function getOffer(params){return{type:GET_OFFER,params:params};};export var getOfferSuccess=function getOfferSuccess(response){return{type:GET_OFFER_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var getOfferFail=function getOfferFail(response){return{type:GET_OFFER_FAIL,response:response};};export var getOfferReset=function getOfferReset(){return{type:GET_OFFER_RESET};};
